channel.title: Section rules?
channel.description:
I believe you should add a rule that goes along the line of 'No nominations of staff members' etc.
Just my two cents, as I'm sure someone is going to post something of the sort!
Thanks.

item.title: Section rules?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Alright well, we’ll figure out what to do about self-nominations among the staff members. Thanks for bringing it up Jc. I’ll close this thread for now.

Read full topic

item.title: Section rules?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I also agree with you guys. I just thought it was against the rules, which is why I created this thread.

If this does occur though, I also would be against self-nomination.

Read full topic

item.title: Section rules?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

In a way, I agree with this. While I support people putting others forward for staff positions, I don’t feel comfortable talking with people who’ve suggested themselves. I don’t feel you can criticize them if they have flaws or talk openly about the candidate (that’s just me). I would personally re-word the rules to disallow self-nomination.

Read full topic

item.title: Section rules?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I actually left that open hoping that people will nominate others for staff members. It’s not something we want to openly encourage (and we would be extremely strict on such a decision), but sometimes able members are easily overlooked by us.

Read full topic
